definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，佛坪大熊猫有季节性垂直移动习性。

sentences.english: To get that figure, look at the figures before seasonal adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 为了得到这个数字，我们先来看下季节调动的情况。

sentences.english: This season, frequent rainfall, the temperature gradually lower end of the 10 snowbound mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 此季节降雨频繁，气温渐低，10月末将大雪封山。

sentences.english: I don't know what season's singing is so loud and clear.
sentences.chinese: 不知道是什么季节的歌声才那么嘹亮。

sentences.english: It assures us a promising season of summer and also the most iportant havvest season-autum.
sentences.chinese: 它承诺我们夏天和最重要的收获的季节秋天。

sentences.english: They were traditionally semisedentary, moving seasonally between fixed sites.
sentences.chinese: 他们是传统的半定居部落，在定居点间季节性迁移。

sentences.english: During the growing season there is no time for socializing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 在作物生长季节，根本就没工夫参加社交活动。

sentences.english: It got cold and fall-like when it was supposed to and I loved every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 我爱这个季节的每分钟。

sentences.english: His bedroom was tolerably large, and rather difficult to warm in bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 他的房间相当大，在恶劣的季节里相当难于保暖。

sentences.english: This is the hydrangea's season, So they all look beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 现在算是绣球花的季节，所以开得很漂亮。

sentences.english: Winter is a DiShuiChengBing, HaQi into frost season.
sentences.chinese: 冬天是一个滴水成冰，哈气成霜的季节。

sentences.english: Another foggy morning in Chengdu –the weather of this season.
sentences.chinese: 又一个大雾的成都早晨，这个季节就是这种天气。

sentences.english: Departures from seasonal jobs, such as Census taker, are not counted.
sentences.chinese: 季节性工作人员的离职，如普查人员，没有加入统计。

sentences.english: Some of you are bound to have met with disappointment in the recruiting season.
sentences.chinese: 在招聘季节中，你们当中有的人注定要与失望为伍。

sentences.english: The fish has also shown up late in the puffin's breeding season.
sentences.chinese: 在海雀繁殖季节，这种鱼出现比较晚。

sentences.english: Autumn is a lively season for the wool market.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是毛织品畅销的季节。

definition: early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
